local_rules.name: google_workspace_multiple_files_sent_as_email_attachment_from_google_drive
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a user sends multiple files from Google Drive as an email attachment to a free email domain, which may indicate data exfiltration.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_password_policy_changed
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when Google Workspace password policy is changed. Security teams can monitor for changes to password policy configuration that may weaken the organization's security posture.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_mfa_disabled
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when multi-factor authentication (MFA) is disabled for a Google Workspace organization. Security teams can monitor for changes to MFA configuration that may weaken the organization's security posture.

local_rules.name: gmail_spike_in_undeliverables
local_rules.author: Bastradamus
local_rules.description: Detects a spike in undeliverable emails, this can be an early indication of a targeted phishing campaign or a compromised user account.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_suspicious_login_and_google_drive_file_download
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a Google Workspace user downloads a file from Google Drive after a suspicious login event occurred.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_saml_idp_configuration_change
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies SAML provider configuration changes in Google Workspace. Security teams can monitor for changes to SAML provider configuration that may weaken the organization's security posture.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_admin_role_assignment
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when an administrator role is assigned to a user account in Google Workspace. Security teams can monitor for the malicious or accidental assignment of administrator privileges to prevent unauthorized access to data.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_marketplace_allowlist_configuration
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when the Google Workspace Marketplace allowlist is configured to allow users to install and run any apps from the Marketplace. Allowing users to install and run any apps may increase the organization's risk of data exfiltration/leakage and increase its attack surface.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_alerts_aggregated_by_severity
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Generates alerts based on Google Workspace alerts center and aggregates them based on severity.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_new_trusted_domain_added
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a domain is added to the list of trusted domains in Google Workspace. An adversary may attempt to manipulate sharing settings for trusted domains to gain unauthorized access to sensitive files and folders within an organization.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_suspicious_login_and_google_drive_file_share
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a Google Workspace user shares a file on Google Drive after a suspicious login event occurred.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_multiple_files_deleted_from_google_drive
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a user deletes multiple files from Google Drive, which may indicate data destruction.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_user_ou_changed
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a Google Workspace user account is moved between Organizational Units.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_malicious_file_downloaded
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a user downloads a potentially malicious file from Google Drive.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_application_added
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a Marketplace app is added in a Google Workspace organization. Installing certain apps may increase the organization's risk of data exfiltration/leakage and increase its attack surface.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_external_user_added_to_group
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when an external user account is added to a group in Google Workspace. Security teams can monitor for unexpected user accounts being added to Google Workspace groups to prevent unauthorized access to data.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_ownership_transferred_on_google_drive
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a Google Workspace user transfers the ownership of a file.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_file_shared_from_google_drive_to_free_email_domain
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a user shares a file on Google Drive with a free email domain, which may indicate data exfiltration.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_encryption_key_files_accessed_by_anonymous_user
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when an encryption key file is accessed by an anonymous user in Google Drive. An adversary may attempt to access encryption keys before moving laterally and compromising sensitive data.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_user_unsuspended
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a user account is unsuspended in Google Workspace.

local_rules.name: chrome_browser_safe_browsing_user_bypass
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects and alerts on users bypassing Chrome Safe Browsing warnings and accessing potentially dangerous content or downloads

local_rules.name: google_workspace_custom_admin_role_created
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a custom administrator role is created in Google Workspace. Security teams can monitor for malicious or accidental configuration of administrator privileges to prevent unauthorized access to data.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_multiple_files_downloaded_from_google_drive
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a user downloads multiple files from Google Drive, which may indicate data exfiltration.

local_rules.name: google_workspace_multiple_files_copied_from_google_drive
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identifies when a user copies multiple files from Google Drive, which may indicate data exfiltration.

local_rules.name: high_risk_user_download_executable_from_macro
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Executable downloaded by Microsoft Excel by user with GCP entity relationship

local_rules.name: suspicious_asn_watchlist
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identify any network connections to a list of ASNs

local_rules.name: suspicious_asn
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identify network traffic based on a specific ASN

local_rules.name: network_traffic_to_specific_country
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identify network traffic based on target country

local_rules.name: Admin_elavation
local_rules.author: Security Team
local_rules.description: Detects when a user is assigned administrative privileges in Google Workspace

local_rules.name: gcp_admin_privileged_roles_added_to_service_accounts
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when admin privileged roles such as Owner or Editor are added to a Service Account.

local_rules.name: gcp_security_command_center_service_disabled
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when GCP Security Command Center services are disabled.

local_rules.name: gcp_multiple_hmac_keys_deleted
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when multiple HMAC authentication keys are deleted from GCP Storage settings.

local_rules.name: gcp_cloud_audit_logging_removed_from_all_services
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when GCP Cloud Audit logs are removed from all services at project or organization level. Audit logging helps organizations maintain security and minimize risk.

local_rules.name: gcp_unauthorized_gke_pod_token_endpoint_usage
local_rules.author: Drew Pilarski - Tempus AI
local_rules.description: Alerts when an authorization token originating from GKE activity is subsequently used within a command line on an endpoint system, suggesting potential credential exfiltration and reuse.

local_rules.name: gcp_storage_bucket_opened_to_public
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when Google Cloud Storage buckets are opened to public by adding allUsers or allAuthenticatedUsers to the access policy.

local_rules.name: gcp_multiple_kms_keys_disabled_or_destroyed
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when multiple KMS crypto key versions are disabled or destroyed from GCP Cloud KMS.

local_rules.name: gcp_multiple_secrets_deleted
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when multiple secrets or secret versions are deleted from GCP Secret Manager.

local_rules.name: gcp_service_account_key_used_from_multiple_countries
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects usage of service account key from multiple countries using Chronicle GeoIP enrichment.

local_rules.name: gcp_free_gmail_domains_added_to_iam_policy
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when free Google Email addressess are added to IAM Policy such as gmail.com, googlemail.com or googlegroups.com.

local_rules.name: gcp_iam_organization_policy_updated_or_deleted
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when GCP IAM Organization Policy is updated or deleted.

local_rules.name: gcp_service_api_key_retrieved
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects a successful attempt to retrieve the service API Keys.

local_rules.name: gcp_workload_identity_pool_disabled_or_deleted
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when GCP Workload identity pools are disabled or deleted. Disabling or deleting a pool will prevent any connected identities from accessing all GCP resources.

local_rules.name: gcp_multiple_service_apis_disabled
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when multiple GCP Service APIs are disabled in a short period of time.

local_rules.name: gcp_excessive_permission_denied_events
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects excessive PermissionDenied events within an hour timeframe from a user

local_rules.name: gcp_successful_api_from_tor_exit_node
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects successful API executions from a Tor exit node.

local_rules.name: gcp_kms_decryption_by_unexpected_service_account
local_rules.author: Drew Pilarski - Tempus AI
local_rules.description: Detects when a Key Management Service (KMS) decryption operation is carried out by a service account that's not in the allowlist. This behavior may indicate unauthorized access to information.

local_rules.name: gcp_exempt_principals_from_audit_log
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when GCP Cloud Audit logs are exempted for principals in all services at project or organization level. Audit logging helps organizations maintain security and minimize risk.

local_rules.name: gcp_gce_image_open_to_public
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when GCP Compute Image is opened to public by adding allAuthenticatedUsers to the access policy.

local_rules.name: gcp_bigquery_results_downloaded_from_multiple_tables
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect a user downloads GCP BigQuery results from multiple tables which might indicate data exfiltration activity.

local_rules.name: gcp_firewall_rule_opened_to_world
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when a GCP Firewall rule is opened to the world (0.0.0.0/0) on all protocols.

local_rules.name: google_cloud_service_account_key_created_or_uploaded
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a service account key is created in or uploaded to a monitored Google Cloud project.

local_rules.name: gcp_identity_low_and_medium_severity_alert_escalation
local_rules.author: Mo Mohajerani
local_rules.description: Detects when a Google Cloud identity experiences a low severity event followed by medium severity event within 24 hours.

local_rules.name: gcp_bigquery_datasets_opened_to_public
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when GCP BigQuery datasets are opened to public by adding allUsers or allAuthenticatedUsers to the access policy.

local_rules.name: github_repository_deploy_key_created_or_modified
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when an SSH deploy key is added or modified in a GitHub repository. A compromised or unauthorized deploy key could allow malicious actors to push unauthorized changes into production environments, potentially bypassing code reviews and testing procedures. This could lead to the introduction of backdoors, malware, or the exfiltration of sensitive data.

local_rules.name: github_personal_access_token_created_from_tor_ip_address
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a GitHub Personal Access Token is created from a known Tor exit node IP address. An adversary may create a Personal Access Token before carrying out follow up actions such as cloning GitHub repositories to steal data.

local_rules.name: github_invitation_sent_to_non_company_email_domain
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when an invitation to join a GitHub enterprise or organization is sent to a non-company email address. This rule can be customized to alert you when a GitHub invitation is sent to an unexpected domain i.e. not one of your company's domains used for email.

local_rules.name: github_user_unblocked_from_accessing_organization_repositories
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a user is unblocked from accessing repositories within a GitHub organization.

local_rules.name: github_enterprise_audit_log_stream_destroyed
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a GitHub audit log stream is destroyed. An adversary may attempt to destroy audit logs to erase their tracks.

local_rules.name: github_repository_visibility_changed_to_public
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when the visibility for a GitHub repository is changed to public.

local_rules.name: github_organization_removed_from_enterprise
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a GitHub organization is removed from an enterprise.

local_rules.name: github_enterprise_audit_log_stream_modified
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a GitHub audit log stream is modified (e.g. paused, enabled, or disabled). An adversary may attempt to interrupt audit logging to erase their tracks.

local_rules.name: github_high_number_of_non_public_github_repositories_downloaded
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a user downloads a high number of non-public GitHub repositories. An adversary may attempt to steal the contents of several GitHub repositories after compromising a user account.

local_rules.name: github_enterprise_deleted
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a GitHub enterprise is deleted.

local_rules.name: github_two_factor_authentication_requirement_disabled
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when two-factor authentication requirements are disabled for a GitHub enterprise or organization.

local_rules.name: github_dependabot_vulnerability_alerts_disabled
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when vulnerability alerts are disabled for GitHub Dependabot.

local_rules.name: github_outgoing_organization_transfer_initiated
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a GitHub organization is transferred to another enterprise account. An adversary may attempt to transfer a GitHub organization to an enterprise account they control in order to steal data.

local_rules.name: github_repository_branch_protection_rules_disabled
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when branch protection rules are disabled for a GitHub repository.

local_rules.name: github_application_installed
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a GitHub application is installed within an organization. An untrusted application can be installed and granted permissions to access data within a GitHub organization.

local_rules.name: github_repository_archived_or_deleted
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a GitHub repository is archived or deleted.

local_rules.name: github_secret_scanning_disabled_or_bypassed
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when components of GitHub secret scanning is disabled for an enterprise or organization.

local_rules.name: github_enterprise_or_organization_recovery_codes_activity
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when the Single Sign-On (SSO) recovery codes are accessed for a GitHub enterprise or organization. An adversary may attempt to access or steal SSO recovery codes in order to maintain access to their target's GitHub environment.

local_rules.name: github_secret_scanning_alert
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a secret is found in a GitHub repository. Adversaries may attempt to harvest leaked/exposed secrets to further infiltrate their target's environment, maintain access, or steal data.

local_rules.name: github_sso_configuration_modified
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when changes are made to a GitHub enterprise or organization's Single Sign-On (SSO) configuration.

local_rules.name: github_user_blocked_from_accessing_organization_repositories
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a user is blocked from accessing repositories within a GitHub organization.

local_rules.name: github_oauth_application_access_restrictions_disabled
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when third-party application access restrictions are disabled for a GitHub organization.

local_rules.name: github_personal_access_token_auto_approve_policy_modified
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when changes are made to a GitHub organization's fine-grained Personal Access Token approval policy.

local_rules.name: github_outgoing_repository_transfer_initiated
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a GitHub repository is transferred.

local_rules.name: github_high_number_of_non_public_github_repositories_cloned
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a user clones a high number of non-public GitHub repositories. An adversary may attempt to steal the contents of several GitHub repositories after compromising a user account.

local_rules.name: github_access_granted_to_personal_access_token_followed_by_high_number_of_cloned_non_public_repositories
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a user grants access to a GitHub Personal Access Token prior to cloning several GitHub non-public GitHub repositories. An adversary may grant access to a Personal Access Token before attempting to steal the contents of several GitHub repositories using a an automated script or offensive tool.

local_rules.name: geoip_user_login_from_multiple_states_or_countries
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect multiple user logins from multiple states or countries using Chronicle GeoIP enrichment.

local_rules.name: logins_from_terminated_employees
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Allowed Logins from Terminated Employees

local_rules.name: dns_query_to_recently_created_domain
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: DNS query to a recently created domain

local_rules.name: ioc_ip_target
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect network events that indicate communication to a watchlisted IP address

local_rules.name: whois_recently_created_domain_access
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects access attempts to a newly created domain via WHOIS enrichment.

local_rules.name: gcti_tor_exit_nodes
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Alert traffic destined for known Tor exit nodes

local_rules.name: ip_target_prevalence
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect events that are communicating to IP addresses that have a low rolling max prevalence.

local_rules.name: hash_prevalence
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Correlate process events with hashes that have a low rolling max over the past 10 days

local_rules.name: network_http_low_prevalence_domain_access
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects network web access to a low prevalence domain

local_rules.name: google_safebrowsing_file_contacts_tor_exit_node
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: A malicious file contacting a known Tor Exit Node.

local_rules.name: ioc_domain_internal_policy
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect DNS events that communicate with gaming sites in MISP. These violate policy.

local_rules.name: safebrowsing_process_creation_hashes_seen_more_than_7_days
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identify process and file creation using safe browsing hashes where the first and last seen are more than 7 days apart

local_rules.name: vt_relationships_file_contacts_ip
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Alert on known Hash contacting known IP with VT Relationships

local_rules.name: vt_relationships_file_executes_file
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Alert on known File Hash executing known File Hash with VT Relationships.

local_rules.name: gcti_benign_binaries_contacts_tor_exit_node
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Alert on Benign Binary contacting a TOR IP

local_rules.name: gcti_remote_access_tools
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Alert process and file create events that are associated with hashes from the GCTI Remote Access Tool list

local_rules.name: network_connection_first_seen_in_past_day
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect network connection to an ip address that was only seen for the first time in the past 24 hours

local_rules.name: vt_relationships_file_downloaded_from_url
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Alert on downloading a known file hash from a known IP with VT Relationships.

local_rules.name: whois_expired_domain_executable_downloaded
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect web traffic to a recently expired domain followed by an exe file creation event

local_rules.name: whois_dns_query_to_typosquatting_domain
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Provides example usage of WHOIS data, detecting a DNS query for a domain that contains a specific string and is not registered with the defined domain registrar.

local_rules.name: whois_expired_domain_accessed
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Example usage of WHOIS data, detecting an executable file download from a domain that's recently expired

local_rules.name: ioc_sha256_hash
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect file/process events that match watchlisted hashes in MISP

local_rules.name: low_prevalence_hash_on_process_launch_low_prevalence_domain_accessed
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a low prevalence hash is seen during a process launch event, and a low prevalence domain is accessed within 10m.

local_rules.name: ioc_domain_C2
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect DNS events that indicate communication to a C2 domain in MISP

local_rules.name: vt_relationships_file_contacts_domain
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Alert on known Hash querying a known hostname with VT Relationships

local_rules.name: ioc_hash_prevalence
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect process/file events that match hashes found in our MISP instance and have low rolling max prevalence

local_rules.name: process_launch_vt_enrichment
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Identify process creations that are tagged exploit in VT

local_rules.name: google_safebrowsing_file_process_creation
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detection of process/file events that match Safe Browsing hashes, which are files deemed to be malicious

local_rules.name: google_safebrowsing_with_prevalence
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect process launch events that correlate to Safe Browsing hash data and have low prevalence

local_rules.name: vt_relationships_file_contacts_tor_ip
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Alert on known Hash contacting Tor IP with VT Relationships.

local_rules.name: ioc_sha256_hash_vt
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect file/process events with watchlisted hashes from MISP that VT flagged as MS Office docx file types

local_rules.name: domain_prevalence
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects DNS events querying domains that have a low rolling max prevalence.

local_rules.name: vt_relationships_file_downloaded_from_ip
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Alert on downloading a known file hash from a known IP with VT Relationships.

local_rules.name: aws_kms_key_disabled_or_scheduled_for_deletion
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when a KMS (Key Management Service) key is disabled or scheduled for deletion.

local_rules.name: aws_ses_service_modification
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when the Amazon Simple Email Service (SES) has been modified where an attacker can modify Amazon SES service to propagate phishing emails campaigns.

local_rules.name: aws_user_creates_permanent_access_key
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when an AWS IAM user creates an AWS Access Key for programmatic calls.

local_rules.name: aws_guardduty_disabled
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a GuardDuty Detector is disabled or suspended.

local_rules.name: aws_s3_made_public_by_acl
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when an AWS S3 bucket is made public using ACL.

local_rules.name: aws_iam_administrator_access_policy_attached
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when AWS IAM AdministratorAccess policy is attached to a user, group or role which can be used for privilege escalation.

local_rules.name: aws_high_number_of_unknown_user_authentication_attempts
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a high number of failed authentication attempts happen for unknown users.

local_rules.name: aws_delete_vpc_flow_logs
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when AWS VPC FLow Logs are deleted.

local_rules.name: aws_rds_snapshot_shared_publicly
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when an Amazon RDS Snapshot is shared publicly.

local_rules.name: aws_unusual_number_of_failed_authentications_from_the_same_ip
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects unusual number of failed authentications from the same IP for valid users.

local_rules.name: aws_privilege_escalation_using_iam_access_key
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when a user creates a new access key for another user and escalates privileges using this newly created access key from the same IP.

local_rules.name: aws_cloudfront_insecure_ssl_policy
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when an insecure SSL policy is configured for an AWS CloudFront distribution.

local_rules.name: aws_backup_plan_deleted
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when AWS Backup Plan is deleted.

local_rules.name: aws_ec2_get_windows_admin_password
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects a successful attempt to retrieve the encrypted Administrator password for a Windows EC2 instance.

local_rules.name: aws_password_policy_change
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when an existing password policy is updated or deleted in an AWS account.

local_rules.name: aws_iam_access_denied_discovery_events
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects excessive AccessDenied events within an hour timeframe from an IAM User

local_rules.name: aws_delete_cloudwatch_log_group
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a CloudWatch log group is deleted.

local_rules.name: aws_api_call_outside_of_organization
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects API Calls from AWS accounts that are not part of the organization.

local_rules.name: aws_iam_activity_by_s3_browser_utility
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect AWS IAM activities associated with the S3 Browser utility.

local_rules.name: aws_s3_public_access_block_removed
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when the S3 Public Access Block configuration has been removed from a bucket or an account.

local_rules.name: aws_enable_disable_region
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when an AWS region is enabled or disabled.

local_rules.name: aws_successful_login_after_multiple_failed_attempts
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects successful login after multiple failed attempts

local_rules.name: aws_successful_api_from_tor_exit_node
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects successful API executions from a Tor exit node.

local_rules.name: aws_saml_identity_provider_changes
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects create, update or delete events of a SAML provider in AWS.

local_rules.name: aws_guardduty_publishing_destination_deleted
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a GuardDuty Detector's publishing destination has been deleted which will prevent the exporting of findings.

local_rules.name: aws_account_leaving_or_removed_from_organization
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect an AWS account attempting to leave or being removed from an AWS organization.

local_rules.name: aws_iam_compromised_key_quarantine_policy_attached
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when the AWS managed policy AWSCompromisedKeyQuarantine has been attached to a user, role, or group. It is applied by the AWS team in the event that the credentials of an IAM user has been compromised or publicly exposed.

local_rules.name: aws_ec2_high_number_of_api_calls
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when an EC2 instance makes high number of API calls.

local_rules.name: aws_ec2_user_data_modified
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect modifications to user data script on an EC2 instance.

local_rules.name: aws_api_gateway_get_keys
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when AWS API Gateway keys are accessed.

local_rules.name: aws_guardduty_trusted_or_threat_ip_lists_tampered
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when a GuardDuty Detector's trusted or threat intel IP lists are deleted or disabled.

local_rules.name: aws_cloudtrail_logging_tampered
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when CloudTrail logging is updated, stopped or deleted.

local_rules.name: aws_multi_factor_authentication_disabled
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects attempts to disable multi-factor authentication for an AWS IAM user.

local_rules.name: aws_lambda_update_function_code
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects an IAM user attempting to update/modify AWS lambda code.

local_rules.name: aws_ec2_ami_or_snapshot_shared_publicly
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when an Amazon EC2 AMI or Snapshot is shared publicly.

local_rules.name: aws_successful_console_authentication_from_multiple_ips
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when an AWS user successfully authenticating from more than one unique IP address within 5 minutes.

local_rules.name: aws_iam_access_analyzer_deleted
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when AWS IAM Access Analyzer is deleted.

local_rules.name: aws_config_service_modified
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when AWS Config Service is updated, stopped or deleted.

local_rules.name: aws_privilege_escalation_using_iam_login_profile
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when a user creates or updates a login profile for another user and escalates privileges using this new user from the same IP.

local_rules.name: aws_new_mfa_method_registered_for_user
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects the registration of a new Multi Factor authentication method for an AWS user.

local_rules.name: aws_alb_insecure_ssl_policy
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects when an insecure SSL policy is configured for an AWS Application Load Balancer.

local_rules.name: aws_security_group_open_to_world
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when an AWS security group is opened to the world (0.0.0.0/0) or (::/0)

local_rules.name: aws_iam_activity_from_ec2_instance
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect AWS IAM activities made by AWS EC2 instances to retain access or escalate privileges.

local_rules.name: aws_console_login_without_mfa
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when a user logs into AWS console without MFA.

local_rules.name: aws_lateral_movement_using_iam_session_token
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detect when an IAM session token is created and used from a different IP.

local_rules.name: aws_excessive_successful_discovery_events
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Detects excessive successful events within a 5 minute timeframe from an IAM User.

local_rules.name: aws_guardduty_command_and_control_activity_detected
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Amazon GuardDuty detects Command and control activity in Amazon EC2, AWS Lambda or Amazon EKS Runtimes.

local_rules.name: aws_guardduty_malicious_or_suspicious_file_executed
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Amazon GuardDuty detects a malicious or suspicious file on an Amazon EC2 instance or a container workload.

local_rules.name: aws_guardduty_denial_of_service_activity_detected
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Amazon GuardDuty detects a Denial of Service (DoS) activity in an Amazon EC2 instance.

local_rules.name: aws_guardduty_black_hole_traffic_detected
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Amazon GuardDuty detects an Amazon EC2 instance or a container attempting to communicate with a black hole IP address.

local_rules.name: aws_guardduty_brute_force_activity_detected
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Amazon GuardDuty detects a brute force activity in an Amazon EC2 or Amazon RDS instance.

local_rules.name: aws_guardduty_penetration_testing_activity_detected
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Amazon GuardDuty detects penetration testing activity from known offensive security distros such as KaliLinux, ParrotLinux or PentooLinux.

local_rules.name: aws_guardduty_crypto_currency_activity_detected
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Amazon GuardDuty detects CryptoCurrency activity in Amazon EC2, AWS Lambda or Amazon EKS Runtimes.

local_rules.name: aws_guardduty_dga_domain_activity_detected
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Amazon GuardDuty detects an Amazon EC2 instance or a container querying algorithmically generated domains (DGA).

local_rules.name: aws_guardduty_tor_network_activity_detected
local_rules.author: Google Cloud Security
local_rules.description: Amazon GuardDuty detects Tor Network activity in an AWS account.
